issue.title: [CF 893] Global Groups do not Export (7.0.0 Alpha)
issue.body:
I was giving my export string to a friend who also had the 7.0.0 alpha, and none of the global groups carried over to the import. I had to move them off, then he could move them back on global so they'd properly export.


> Posted by CurseForge user Freeebo | Imported from CurseForge issue #893 | Raw

comments.body:
Global groups are not part of a profile, so they will not be exported when you export a profile. Export them individually if they are essential to the function of the profile. I will consider adding an export option to put all global groups into one string, but I'm still not entirely sure if I want to do that or not.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
